Name: Dublin Castle

Locations.Name: Dublin Castle (DEMO)
Locations.Subtitle: Testing a Location Upload
Locations.AboutText: This is the demonstration trail for the final delivery of the Virtual Historic Dublin Cities project SBIR project response from this great adventure ltd.

Storys.Title: Build me a castle
Storys.ContentText: King John orders the construction of a castle in Dublin to protect his treasure and power in Ireland.
